title: Future of Daniel Jones? Expectations for Trey Lance; AFC South checklist; Head coach/Quarterback combo
itunes:title: Future of Daniel Jones? Expectations for Trey Lance; AFC South checklist; Head coach/Quarterback combo
description:
The Good Morning Football Podcast begins analyzing how Daniel Jones can solidify himself as the long term answer in New York. Hosts Will Selva, James Palmer, Mike Garafolo, and Super Bowl champion Michael Robinson share their concerns about Jones and make suggestions on how he can earn a contract extension with the Giants. Then, the guys share what their expectations are for Trey Lance as he steps into a starting role with the San Francisco 49ers. Later, the GMFB panel runs through the checklist for success in the AFC South - find out which host believes the Indianapolis Colts need to win a playoff game for their season to be successful. The show finishes up discussing which new head coach and quarterback will thrive this season.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
